attributes.action: keep the 101 service active around Leicestershire and Rutland
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The 101 Service is a non-emergency service offering 24 hour advice and information about Anti-social behaviour and crimes which are not urgent enough for the public to ring 999. The service has recieved around 70,000 calls since starting as a trial in September 2007.
